original_text: She sits at the door of her house. She also has a seat at the highest part of the city. She sits at the door of her house. She also has a seat at the highest part of the city. She sits at the door of her house. She also has a seat at the highest part of the city.
korean_text: 자기 집 문에 앉으며 성읍 높은 곳에 있는 자리에 앉아서

sentences.original_text: She sits at the door of her house
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자기 집 문에 앉아 있습니다

sentences.original_text: She also has a seat at the highest part of the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 또한 성읍의 가장 높은 곳에 자리를 가지고 있습니다
